PROFILE.PROFESIONAL_PROFILE_1: I am an ambitious, motivated and compromised software engineer and web developer with more than 8 years of experience in the IT industry. I think effectiveness and well done job are the keys.
PROFILE.PROFESIONAL_PROFILE_2: Although I specialize in front end solutions I have strong experience in the full cycle of the web development covering since database to the UI. As I have worked in multiple projects and environments I'm very adaptive professional and I can help in many scenarios.
PROFILE.PROFESIONAL_PROFILE_3: I have worked in projects with some of the largest private companies in Europe (Telefonica, Deutsche Bank, Iberdrola, ...) as well in public sector (Ministry of Justice UK, Aragon Parliament) having very different business such as real-estate, banking, energy.

JAVASCRIPT.LABEL: Javascript
JAVASCRIPT.TEXT: Very strong experience on the most popular frameworks/libraries (React and Angular). Always taking advantage from latest features from ECMAScript and implementing modern architectures such as Redux or NgRx.

BACKEND.LABEL: Back end
BACKEND.TEXT: Extensive knowledge and experience on developing RESTfull APIs with so different technologies like .NET Core or NodeJS/Express and both SQL and NoSQL databases access by using ORM frameworks.

CONTINUOUS_INTEGRATION.LABEL: Continuous Integration (CI)
CONTINUOUS_INTEGRATION.TEXT: As software engineer I like to play an important role in the whole continuous integration process by following practices including writting extensive test suites, using git properly or doing code reviews.

ARCHITECTURE.LABEL: Sofware Architecture
ARCHITECTURE.TEXT: Ability to define the best high-level technical solution and software standards for every scenario. Having experience on multiple platforms / frameworks makes easier to optimize the full process as much as possible.

DESIGN.LABEL: Web design & templating
DESIGN.TEXT: Showing all the content in a proper way to your users is a must nowadays. I can help with this by using HTML5, SASS and new design technologies coming onto the market every day.

IDEAS.LABEL: Fresh ideas
IDEAS.TEXT: Besides achieving the requirements from the employers/clients I also like to suggest new solutions to improve the quality of the product. I'm not a conformist developer.
